<Text:The Peekskill Lighting and Railroad Company
northern Westchester County and southern Putnam County
1:
--------------------
Text: Peekskill Lighting and Railroad Company:  The earliest segment was constructed by the Peekskill Traction Company in 1899 running 5.5 miles from the New York Central Railroad train station at Peekskill to Lake Mohegan.
Triplets:<Peekskill Lighting and Railroad Company
2:
--------------------

<Text: Peekskill Lighting and Railroad Company:  The company was unable to meet payments for construction of the line, so the contractor operated the railroad until it was sold to the Peekskill Lighting and Railroad Company in 1900 (itself a consolidation of the Peekskill Gas Light Co., Peekskill Electric Light and Power Co., and the Peekskill Traction Co.).
